weaponProfile.title: Warden
weaponProfile.specialAbility: Non-lethal. Blocking incoming attacks builds up a charge. A heavy attack expends the charge to release a powerful electrical blast that can chain to nearby enemies.

manufacturingIntel.creator: Kang Tao Non-Lethal Enforcement Division
manufacturingIntel.creatorReputation: Kang Tao's reputation is built on smart guns that think. The Warden comes from a different philosophy: a smart weapon that *defends*. The project was led by a former martial arts master who believed that the best way to win a fight was to control your opponent's energy and use it against them.
manufacturingIntel.developmentHistory: The Warden was designed as a crowd control and VIP protection tool for Kang Tao's elite corporate sentinels. The core technology is its 'Kinetic-to-Capacitor' conversion system. The staff's frame absorbs the kinetic energy of blocked impacts—melee or ballistic—and stores it in a high-capacity capacitor in the head. A heavy attack discharges this capacitor in a targeted, chain-lightning blast. It's a weapon that grows stronger the more aggressively it is attacked, making it the perfect tool for a defensive operator facing overwhelming numbers.

strengths: Excellent for crowd control and managing multiple opponents in a non-lethal manner.
Rewards a defensive, patient, and skilled playstyle.
The chain lightning effect can incapacitate an entire squad with a single, well-timed discharge.
Longer reach than most one-handed melee weapons.
weaknesses: Deals purely non-lethal electrical damage, making it useless for assassination gigs.
Low base damage; relies on the charged blast to be effective.
Ineffective if the user cannot successfully block incoming attacks to build a charge.
Vulnerable to high-damage, unblockable heavy attacks.
tacticalAssessment.recommendedRoles: Bodyguard, Corporate Sentinel, Peacekeeper, Martial Artist.
tacticalAssessment.masteryArchetype: A 'Guardian' build. A merc with high Reflexes and Cool attributes who specializes in counter-attacks and defense. The ideal user combines the Warden with a Kerenzikov or Sandevistan, using time dilation to perfectly block a flurry of incoming attacks, instantly building a full charge. They then unleash the electrical blast to neutralize the entire group before finishing them with non-lethal takedowns. They are an untouchable, elegant master of control.

acquisitionIntel.marketAvailability: Uncommon. As a corporate security weapon, the Warden is not sold in most street-level gun shops. It can be purchased from high-end, corporate-affiliated weapon vendors in Corpo Plaza. It is also a rare drop from high-level Kang Tao corporate guards.
acquisitionIntel.rumoredLocation: The head of security for the Kang Tao orbital launch facility is a renowned martial artist who is said to wield a master-crafted Warden with a gold-inlaid frame and an overclocked capacitor. He has reportedly never been defeated in a sparring match.

fieldTestimonials.context: Protecting a corpo exec during a shareholder riot.
fieldTestimonials.feedback: 'They came at us with pipes and bats. I just stood my ground, blocked every swing. The staff was humming, fully charged in seconds. One heavy swing, and the whole front line dropped, twitching. The rest scattered. I didn't have to kill a soul. This thing is the ultimate de-escalation tool.'

fieldTestimonials.context: One-on-one cage match against an Animal.
fieldTestimonials.feedback: 'Blocking? Who has time for blocking? I just wanted to hit him. This thing feels like a wet noodle until it's charged up, and you can't charge it if you're the one throwing all the punches. It's a reactive weapon for people who are afraid to just go in and break some chrome.'

fieldTestimonials.context: Regina Jones gig: neutralize a cyberpsycho non-lethally.
fieldTestimonials.feedback: 'The psycho was fast, all blades and fury. I just kept blocking, letting the Warden soak up his rage. When it was glowing, I unleashed the blast. He went down like a sack of potatoes, system rebooted. It's an elegant weapon for a more civilized merc. Regina was very happy.'
